creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
markings: Watermark:  [Auvergne 1742]; close to Heawood 3393 in size, but with different paper maker's name above.  Paper maker's mark is mostly obscured, although perhaps an AD, at the end of the inscription can be seen, as in SAUVADE
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Figure Study of Mucius Scaevola
